Posts.Content: Nov 26, 2013 01:22PM nellysca2013 wrote: hi, I had my mastectomy with TE last Weds and still have drains. At home now but SO uncomfortable to sleep with the post surg bra and tubes. Wondering if any of u can offer any helpful hints and info. I need my sleep as I have 2.5 yr old twins and a 5 yr old to care for. Thank you and wishing you all quick recovery!!
